title: LEADYOU
subTitle: README Generator for OSS
description: LEADYOU is a service that helps you create a README automatically from GitHub's public repositories.
invalidRepository: This repository is a private repository or does not exist.
repositoryPlaceholder: Input an url of your public GitHub repository
autoFillExplain: Fill in some forms automatically based on the information of the repository.
warningForRequirements: ⚠️ Red frames indicate its fields are required.
confirmGenerate: Some required fields are not filled out. Is it OK to generate the README as it is?
proviso-1: If you generate a README, you are deemed to have accepted the <l>Terms of Service</l>.
proviso-2: And if you upload README that is generated by LEADYOU to your public repository on GitHub, it will be on <l>New Generated READMEs</l>.
proviso-3: If you do not want it, please refer <l>Help</l> page.
